name: Reel Black Studios
description: Reel Black Studios is a Black-owned creative animation studio run by husband and wife duo Dara King and Chris Fequiere. They are known for their work on the short film "Burning Rubber" and other animations

name: Martian Blueberry
description: Co-founded by Love Barnett and award-winning animator Carl Jones, Martian Blueberry is an animation powerhouse focused on creating content that resonates with diverse communities. Carl Jones is known for his work on "The Boondocks," "Black Dynamite," and "Sugar and Toys."

name: Lion Forge Entertainment
description: Founded by David Steward II, Lion Forge Entertainment is an Academy Award-winning animation and live-action studio committed to authentic storytelling and celebrating diverse voices. They have a digital-first publishing model and offer cinematic comics, games, and animation

name: Small Town Animation Studios
description: Founded by Jermaine Hargrove and co-owned with Whaketa Hargrove, this studio focuses on developing and producing 3D CGI feature film/TV animation for a global audience. They are committed to sustainable animation practices and are known for their work on the animated feature film "Gumshe."

name: Black Women Animate (BWAS)
description: Founded by Taylor K. Shaw, BWAS is a movement and studio empowering Black women and promoting diverse stories in animation. They offer services like graphics packages and character design and focus on Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI)

name: Chaz Bottoms Animation Studios (CBA Studios)
description: Founded by Chaz Bottoms, this 2D animation studio is known for its commitment to diversity and powerful storytelling. They have worked with clients like Disney and Apple TV, and collaborated with John Legend and LeBron James

name: BWA Studios
description: BWA Studios is a Black female-owned animation house that creates and produces programming and content for all platforms. They focus on building equity in the animation industry by consciously recruiting Black women, women of color, and nonbinary people of color
